芃字的基本解释

芃
péng
兽毛蓬松的样子：“有芃者狐，率彼幽草。”
草茂盛的样子。
古书上说的一种草。
姓。

芃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［péng］
［《廣韻》薄紅切，平東，並。］
［《廣韻》房戎切，平東，奉。］
“梵2”的被通假字。
(1)草茂盛貌。参见“芃芃”。
(2)兽毛丰满而蓬松貌。
(3)用同“芁”。

芃字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芃； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1017第22
【唐韻】薄紅切【集韻】【韻會】蒲蒙切，?音篷。【說文】草盛也。【詩·鄘風】芃芃其麥。【傳】麥芃芃然方盛長。　又【詩·小雅】有芃者狐，率彼幽草。【傳】芃小，獸貌。【註】芃，尾長貌。　又草名。【山海經】成侯之山，其草多芃。　又【唐韻】房戎切【集韻】【韻會】符風切【正韻】符中切，?音馮。義同。　又【唐韻古音】讀凡，引《說文》云芃，从艸凡聲。

考證：〔【詩·衞風】芃芃其麥。〕　謹照原書衞風改鄘風。
芃字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
芃字的起名意思

：兽毛蓬松的样子；草茂密的样子。

Peng
Basic explanation of words
Peng
péng
The fluffy look of the animal's hair: "There is a fox, and the grass is quiet."
The grass looks lush.
A kind of grass said in ancient books.
name.
Peng
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［péng］
["Guangyun" thin red cut, Pingdong, and. ]
["Guangyun" Fang Rongqie, Pingdong, Feng. ]
"Fan 2" was passed falsely.
(1) The grass is lush. See "Pengpeng".
(2) The fur is plump and fluffy.
(3) Use the same as "芁".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　芃; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 1017 Page 22
【Tang Yun】Bo Hongqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Pu Mengqie, sound canopy. [Said the text] Cao Sheng also. 【Poetry·Fengfeng】Peng Peng Qimai. 【Biography】Mai Pengran has a prosperous and long side.　[Poetry·Xiaoya] There is a fox like a fox, and the grass is quiet. [Biography] Peng Xiao, beast appearance. [Note] Peng, with a long tail.　Also cursive name. 【Shanhaijing】The mountain of Chenghou is rich in grass.　 [Tang Yun] Fang Rongqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fu Fengqie [Zheng Yun] Fu Zhongqie,? Yin Feng. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun Ancient Sound] Reading Fan, quoting Yun Peng in "Suo Wen", from the sound of Fan Fan. Textual research: [[Poetry·Weifeng] Peng Peng Qimai. 〕　I would like to change the style of Wei Feng to Fan Feng according to the original book.

Peng
Name meaning
: The look of fluffy animal hair; the look of dense grass.
péng
сущ.
1) густые высокие травы; густая листва
其草多芃 среди трав там много густых и высоких
2) густой (пушистый) мех
有芃者狐 у лисы мех густой
